oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Ronald James interview
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: James, Ronald; Caudill, Ed
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: James, Ronald; Vietnam War, 1961-1975
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Ronald James served in the U.S. Navy during the Vietnam War. The interview was conducted by Billy Minser on January 16, 2020 at the Blount County Public Library.
